mapper.select: SELECT dia.diagnosis_date AS diagnosisDate, dia.diagnosis_symptom AS diagnosisSymptom, ah.animal_hospital_name AS animalHospitalName FROM diagnosis AS dia JOIN animalhospital AS ah ON dia.seq_animal_hospital = ah.seq_animal_hospital WHERE dia.seq_doctor = 1 AND dia.seq_animal = 1 ORDER BY dia.diagnosis_date DESC
